snippet: The Census Bureau said that spending on home building rose 40 percent over the last year, but that rate is down considerably from its peak.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off the Charts column; Census Bureau says that spending on home building rose 40 percent in 2012, but rate is down considerably from peak, remaining at historically low levels.
lead_paragraph: The Census Bureau said that spending on home building rose 40 percent over the last year, but that rate is down considerably from its peak.

headline.print_headline: Construction Improves, Yet Is Still Historically Low
headline.seo: Census Reports Home Construction Has Improved
headline.main: Construction Improves, Yet Is Still Historically Low
